column2: "Leader, this is a Darker subjugation order. We need to gather Darker Factor. We need a lot, so your help will be appreciated."
"I- Ignis, Master won't understand what this is about. You see, this is a request from Seraphy..."

"You know the Erzimarut ship? They need this stuff to maintain their life support pods...
You know, Akhtar's people?"
"Whatever the details, the lives of the Erzimarut are at stake. We must deal with this immediately."
"Correct. To collect Darker Factor, you have to defeat Darkers. Please, help us."
"Leader, I have to ask you to subdue more Darkers."
"The Erzimarut need a considerable amount of Darker Factor. The more they can get, the better."
